amendment.description: To ensure that the budget includes funds to extend temporary unemployment compensation benefits, provides benefits to the million long-term unemployed Americans, and provides benefits to part-time and low-wage workers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 315 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 85.

action.text: Amendment SA 315 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S4341-4343; text: CR S4341-4342) To ensure that the budget includes funds to extend temporary unemployment compensation benefits, provides benefits to the million long-term unemployed Americans, and provides benefits to part-time and low-wage workers.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 315 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 85.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 315 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 85.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 315 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
